mapper.select: SELECT mi_info_table.id, mi_power_table.state, dtu_table.id as dtuId, mi_power_table.power, mi_info_table.capacity, mi_power_table.update_time FROM mi_info_table JOIN mi_power_table ON mi_info_table.id = mi_power_table.id JOIN dtu_table ON mi_info_table.dtu_id = dtu_table.id WHERE dtu_table.plant_id = #{plantId}

SELECT plant_info_table.name FROM mi_info_table JOIN dtu_table ON mi_info_table.dtu_id = dtu_table.id JOIN plant_info_table ON dtu_table.plant_id = plant_info_table.id WHERE mi_info_table.id = #{miId}
